mapper.insert: insert into sys_log(log_group,log_type,log_action,user_id,dept_id, ip,url,log_status,log_time,log_desc, log_content) select parent_code,#{typeCode},#{actionCode},#{userId},#{deptId}, #{ip},#{url},#{logStatus},#{logTime},#{logDesc}, #{logContent,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=com.cowave.commons.framework.support.mybatis.JsonTypeHandler} from sys_dict where dict_code = #{typeCode}
mapper.select:
select g.dict_label group_name, t.dict_label type_name, t.dict_value view_key, d.dict_label action_name, l.id,l.user_id,u.user_name,l.dept_id,de.dept_name,l.log_group,l.log_type,l.log_action, l.ip,l.url,l.log_status,l.log_time,l.log_desc from sys_log l
join sys_user u on l.user_id = u.user_id
left join sys_user u on l.user_id = u.user_id
join sys_dict g on l.log_group = g.dict_code
left join sys_dict g on l.log_group = g.dict_code
join sys_dict t on l.log_type = t.dict_code
left join sys_dict t on l.log_type = t.dict_code
left join sys_dept de on l.dept_id = de.dept_id left join sys_dict d on l.log_action = d.dict_code where 1 = 1
and g.dict_code = #{log.groupCode}
and t.dict_code = #{log.typeCode}
and u.user_name like concat('%', #{log.userName}, '%')
and l.log_time >= #{log.beginTime}
and l.log_time <= #{log.endTime}
ORDER BY l.log_time DESC

select g.dict_label group_name, t.dict_label type_name, d.dict_label action_name, l.id,l.user_id,u.user_name,l.dept_id,de.dept_name,l.log_group,l.log_type,l.log_action, l.ip,l.url,l.log_status,l.log_time,l.log_desc,l.log_content from sys_log l left join sys_user u on l.user_id = u.user_id left join sys_dept de on l.dept_id = de.dept_id left join sys_dict g on l.log_group = g.dict_code left join sys_dict t on l.log_type = t.dict_code left join sys_dict d on l.log_action = d.dict_code where l.id = #{id}
